game.name: Cursed Profit
game.categories: Single-player, Multi-player, Co-op, Online Co-op, Steam Achievements, Stats, Steam Leaderboards, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Cursed Profit is a co-op horror game for up to four players, immersing you in eerie Case Files with a mix of terrifying and humorous enemies.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Cursed Profit is a co-op horror game for up to four players, immersing you in eerie Case Files with a mix of terrifying and humorous enemies.
